description:
Pokemon Go's new Precious Paths season is officially underway, and the mobile game is ushering it in with a variety of events and activities in December.

On top of new Raid bosses and Spotlight Pokemon, this month will see the arrival of a few new Pokemon like Nacli and Clobbopus, while every featured Pokemon from the past year is coming back for December's two-day Community Day event.

Pokemon Go is also getting into the festive spirit later this month with a big two-part Winter Holiday celebration, which will include a special Winter Weekend mini-event. And before December wraps up, the mobile game will hold a New Year's celebration to ring in 2026 in style.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Pokemon Go December 2025 Events: Raid Bosses, Spotlight Hours, Community Day, And More

description:
Paramount has announced yet another Sonic the Hedgehog movie, scheduling a "Sonic universe feature" for release in theaters on December 22, 2028.

The fourth entry in the main Sonic film series is scheduled for March 2027, and this newly announced film will follow the next year, according to Deadline. Exactly what the movie is, however, is unconfirmed. All that Paramount confirmed is that it exists in the Sonic universe.

The three Sonic movies thus far have together brought in more than $1.2 billion globally, so it's no surprise to see Paramount dig in for even more. A Knuckles TV show spin-off for Paramount+ was released in 2024. There is no word yet on if it will get a second season.
title: The Sonic Movie Universe Keeps Expanding

description:
Last month, word broke that Rockstar Games' seminal Western Red Dead Redemption is getting a modern update for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and Switch 2. It's going to officially launch on December 2, but the upgrade is already going live in different territories. Now, the first footage of Red Dead Redemption's new update running on PS5 is already online.

GameRiot shared the following video of the opening minutes of Red Dead Redemption running 60 frames per second on PS5. Rockstar says the update provides the game with "enhanced image quality, HDR support, and resolutions up to 4K."
title: Red Dead Redemption's New Modern Upgrade Shown Off In First Gameplay Footage

description:
Industry leaders in Japan recently gathered to honor Tomonobu Itagaki, the creator of Dead or Alive and the 3D Ninja Gaiden series, who passed away in October at age 58. The memorial venue was filled with heartfelt tributes, including copies of his games, artwork, swords, and pieces of his iconic clothing. Photos shared by attendees showed just how much he meant to the gaming community.

Itagaki was a major figure in Japanese game development. He founded Team Ninja in the late 1990s and helped shape modern action and fighting games. At the memorial, Koei Tecmo executive Yosuke Hayashi shared memories of meeting him in 2001. Hayashi recalled being assigned to Itagaki's team and being told there was no work for him.
title: Industry Mourns Tomonobu Itagaki, Creator Of Dead Or Alive And 3D Ninja Gaiden

description:
Arc Raiders players recently discovered an exploit that allowed them to loot locked rooms without needing a keycard. Naturally, the exploit quickly became popular--and frustrating for players who didn't use it--leading Embark Studios to apply a "hot" fix to this part of the game. If you now decide to cheese your way into one of these treasure rooms, you can now expect a toasty reception inside.

Using a keycard to access one of these rooms ties into the high-risk, high-reward nature of Arc Raiders, but the exploit essentially bypasses it. Players managed to break into the room, grab valuable gear without worrying about being ambushed, and pick the location clean. This meant that players who unlocked the room properly would find it stripped bare, leading to frustration within the Arc Raiders community.

To remedy this, Embark Studios made it so that the rooms automatically activate flamethrowers when you glitch into
title: Arc Raiders Introduces Hilarious New Fix For Locked Room Exploits: Burn Everything

The test will be a preview of what players can expect from a December 9 Battlefield 6 update and will be conducted on the Conquest and Escalation versions of the Eastwood and Operation Firestorm maps.

description:
December 10 marks the fifth anniversary of Cyberpunk 2077, and developer CD Projekt is teasing something to mark the occasion. On its social media channels, the company posted a "Cyberpunk 2077 birthday and anniversary calendar" image alongside a cryptic message. "Secure comms channel established. Standby for incoming priority transmission," the message reads, with images of characters and dates accompanying it.

The tweet hints at something happening on December 10--the day Cyberpunk 2077 launched in 2020--and another on December 12 linked to Solomon Reed. On December 19, it looks like we'll hear from the songbird herself, Song So Mi.

In 2022, Jennifer Hale was confirmed as the new voice of Bayonetta in Bayonetta 3, following the departure of the character's original voice actress, Hellena Taylor. The recasting of Taylor and the subsequent controversy dogged Hale during the production of that game, and it's an experience she didn't enjoy despite her love for the character.

During an interview with GAMINGbible, Hale indicated that she would "love to play Bayonetta again," but she wasn't happy about the situation she found herself in.

title: Bayonetta 3 Actor Says She Was "Thrown Under The Bus" After Recasting

It looks like Fortnite will borrow a feature from one of its competing battle royales, should recently surfaced leaks prove to be accurate. According to prominent Fortnite leaker Shiina, the Epic Games title is adding something very similar to the Gulag from Call of Duty: Warzone.

description:
Tribute Games clearly believes in the power of nostalgia. Its last project, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge, brought the heroes in a half shell back to their 2D side-scrolling roots, to critical acclaim, while the rest of the company's portfolio is marked with games steeped in a retro look and feel. Now, Tribute is trying it again with Marvel Cosmic Invasion, a beat-'em-up featuring Marvel superheroes, and the results are similarly great, as Cosmic Invasion earns its place alongside the top retro brawlers of the modern era, thanks to both a solid roster of playable heroes and a few influences from other parts of Marvel's gaming history.

Marvel Cosmic Invasion drops its all-star cast of heroes into a galactic battle against Annihilus, who is using an army of parasitic bugs to take over the universe. title: Marvel Cosmic Invasion Review - It's Marvel, Baby

A report from Variety said British actor Martin Bobb-Semple will be a series regular on the show, though his role was not confirmed. Bobb-Semple is perhaps best known for his recurring roles on All American: Homecoming and One of Us is Lying.

The biggest mover overall was Risk of Rain 2, which moved up from No. 54 to No. 6 on Steam in the US on the weekly engagement charts.

World of Warcraft is getting player housing on December 2, and Blizzard has now released a step-by-step guide on what players will need to do to claim and customize their forever home in Azeroth.

Like most things in WoW, it all begins with a quest. Players who have preordered the game's Midnight expansion and log in after the release of the MMORPG's 11.2.7 patch will automatically receive a quest that will lead them straight into the housing tutorial. If players somehow lose the tutorial quest, they can easily start it again by clicking on the new housing icon in the game's micro menu.

description:
The Holiday 2025 shopping season is in full swing, with Black Friday and Cyber Monday spending expected to push to new heights. Video games are among the most sought-after products this year, but which games and systems do people in the US want the most?

A report from Adobe Analytics said video games and consoles are expected to be among the "key drivers of holiday spending" this year in the US, with seven products overall singled out. Ranked in no particular order, the top seven most sought-after gaming items for Holiday 2025 are:

  • Nintendo Switch 2
  • PlayStation 5
  • Xbox Series X
  • Donkey Kong Bananza
  • Madden NFL 26
  • NBA 2K26
  • Call of Duty: Black Ops 7

Adobe's report is forecasting a total spend in the US of $253.4 billion (+5.3%) for Holiday 2025 shopping season (November 1-November 23), and that's just for online shopping.
title: These Are The Consoles And Games People Want The Most For The Holidays, Analytics Firm Says

description:
What's next for the Hitman franchise? Developer IO Interactive isn't spilling the beans on its future plans for Agent 47, but the studio has confirmed that Hitman 3--now known as Hitman: World of Assassination following a 2023 rebranding--won't be the final entry in the franchise. In a new interview, IO Interactive CEO Hakan Abrak stated that news on the series will be revealed in due time, alongside details on the upcoming co-op mode for World of Assassination.

"Of course, there will be more Hitman," Abrak said to Variety. "But right now, I think we need to get to the other side of this year, and next year you'll get more news about Hitman co-op, because I think co-op is a really, really good extension to the universe and will introduce very interesting mechanics and combinations in World of Assassination. But we will after that be talking about the ne
title: The Hitman Franchise Will Continue, IO Interactive Confirms

description:
It should be of little surprise that Fortnite is still doing really well, with its new Hollywood-themed first season of Chapter 7 reportedly drawing in a peak of around 3 million concurrent players at its launch.

The reported figure comes from prolific Fortnite leaker Shiina, who shared the number in an X post on Sunday. The new season, subtitled "Pacific Break," began Saturday, bringing a completely different battle royale map, along with new weapons and a battle pass.

This comes off the tail end of the Chapter 6 "Zero Hour" finale, which attracted 10.5 million players in-game and over 3 million viewers through livestreaming, according to Epic Games. The publisher unironically shared the Martin Scorsese "cinema" meme in celebration of these figures.
title: Fortnite's Chapter 7 Launch Reportedly Propelled The Game To 3 Million Concurrent Players

Nintendo's legendary handheld system introduced the concept of portable gaming to the masses, sporting a massive and varied game library with broad appeal. Despite the hardware's inherent limitation of a monochrome screen and small display, its ease of development and low cost helped build a legacy filled with unique and engaging original games and spinoffs--both from Nintendo and third parties alike. Today, we're taking a look at the best titles for this groundbreaking portable--some very familiar, some cult classics--and why they should be on the must-play list for everyone exploring the legacy of the Game Boy.

There's still no release date or window for The Witcher 4. But that's not stopping CD Projekt Red from stating again that a whole new trilogy might launch within a six-year timespan. That's been the plan for years, but the company reasserted this position during a recent financial call, according to Eurogamer.

CD Projekt co-CEO Michal Nowakowski was asked about the company utilizing Unreal Engine 5 for The Witcher 4 and whether that could lead to shorter development cycles for future sequels. "In a way, yes, I do believe that further games should be delivered in a shorter period of time--as we
title: The Witcher 4 Still Has Two Sequels Planned Within Six Years, CD Projekt Red Asserts

description:
The debate over using generative AI art in media such as television show intros and background art in games has escalated over the past few years. A number of players have recently accused Epic Games of using generative AI for art in Fortnite, but things may be less easy to spot than some of them thought.

In the wake of Epic's CEO thinking that AI labeling should be done away with, fans pointed out a few alleged instances in Chapter 7. There's a poster for the Mile High Retreat, showing a Yeti napping in a hammock with the caption "relax faster, relax higher." Looking closer, though, the Yeti appears to have four toes on one foot and five toes on the other. Misnumbered digits are usually an indicator that something was AI-generated.

"So I'm pretty much done with Fortnite," one player
title: Players Think They've Found AI Use In Fortnite Chapter 7, But Artist Shows It's Not Cut And Dried

description:
Several months have passed since the release of Silent Hill F, and thanks to online chatter, memes, and an active community, the survival-horror game is still trending. That's according to Silent Hill series producer Motoi Okamoto and writer Ryukishi07, who recently spoke about how Silent Hill F continues to stay in the spotlight.

"Recently, discourse about games is being consumed at a rapid pace," Okamoto said to Dengeki Online (via Automaton), . "But games that do get talked about even months after release are the ones that are fun to theorize about and analyze, and they usually get a lot of character fan art. From my experience, titles which are able to show us that kind of hype tend to live on for longer
title: Silent Hill F Producer Explains How Fan Art And Memes Have Kept It Trending
